translations.name: Japanese Manga Bible Stories
translations.description: The story of the Bible from Genesis to Paul’s letters in exciting comic book style (manga) stories for children, youth and adults. Pronunciation marks. Japanese-style manga B&W illustrations.

translations.name: まんが聖書物語
translations.description: The story of the Bible from Genesis to Paul’s letters in exciting comic book style (manga) stories for children, youth and adults. Pronunciation marks. Japanese-style manga B&W illustrations.

translations.name: Lazarus Wesley
translations.description_short: A respected Stoney Nakoda Elder, Lazarus became an ordained lay Minister for the United Church in 1970. He faithfully served the Church on the Stoney Nakoda First Nation.
